Syl Johnson was a musical genius, sampled over 400 times, although his career was often overshadowed by his Hi Records labelmate Al Green. The superb documentary Any Way The Wind Blows (2015) https://t.co/n0QcCi0bye showed the world what we missed out on. #soul #RIP #SylJohnson https://t.co/DNEUG89f68
